lines.text: I heard a man on TV one time say that paranoia, is just another word for heightened awareness
And when she turned it on it shot that metal thing right up into her face, shot it up just like a gun. Isn't that bad? It shot it up right through her eyeball!
It ain't a thing, it's a signal...... a pulse, kinda like a voice. So what you've got to do is to get rid of anything in your house that might have ears to hear it.
We had a microwave and everything, but mom just never used it. She was scared of it, she says it could make you sterile.

[about the dead grass surrounding the late neighbor's home]
He blamed us for the dead grass, he thought we were going over to his garden and killing it... like there was some conspiracy involving the whole neighberhood against him
